verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

After the doings<WH4639> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, wherein ye dwelt<WH3427>, shall ye not do<WH6213>: and after the doings<WH4639> of the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, whither I bring<WH935> you, shall ye not do<WH6213>: neither shall ye walk<WH3212> in their ordinances<WH2708>.
Ye shall do<WH6213> my judgments<WH4941>, and keep<WH8104> mine ordinances<WH2708>, to walk<WH3212> therein: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
Ye shall therefore keep<WH8104> my statutes<WH2708>, and my judgments<WH4941>: which<WH834> if a man<WH120> do<WH6213>, he shall live<WH2425> in them: I am the LORD<WH3068>.
None of you shall approach<WH7126> to any<WH376> that is near<WH7607> of kin<WH1320> to him, to uncover<WH1540> their nakedness<WH6172>: I am the LORD<WH3068>. near: Heb. remainder of his flesh

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy father<WH1>, or the nakedness<WH6172> of thy mother<WH517>, shalt thou not uncover<WH1540>: she is thy mother<WH517>; thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>.
The nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> wife<WH802> shalt thou not uncover<WH1540>: it is thy father's<WH1> nakedness<WH6172>.

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy sister<WH269>, the daughter<WH1323> of thy father<WH1>, or daughter<WH1323> of thy mother<WH517>, whether she be born<WH4138> at home<WH1004>, or born<WH4138> abroad<WH2351>, even their nakedness<WH6172> thou shalt not uncover<WH1540>.

The nakedness<WH6172> of thy son's<WH1121> daughter<WH1323>, or of thy daughter's<WH1323> daughter<WH1323>, even their nakedness<WH6172> thou shalt not uncover<WH1540>: for theirs<WH2007> is thine own nakedness<WH6172>.
The nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> wife's<WH802> daughter<WH1323>, begotten<WH4138> of thy father<WH1>, she is thy sister<WH269>, thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>.
Thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> sister<WH269>: she is thy father's<WH1> near kinswoman<WH7607>.
Thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy mother's<WH517> sister<WH269>: for she is thy mother's<WH517> near kinswoman<WH7607>.
Thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy father's<WH1> brother<WH251>, thou shalt not approach<WH7126> to his wife<WH802>: she is thine aunt<WH1733>.
Thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy daughter in law<WH3618>: she is thy son's<WH1121> wife<WH802>; thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>.
Thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of thy brother's<WH251> wife<WH802>: it is thy brother's<WH251> nakedness<WH6172>.

Thou shalt not uncover<WH1540> the nakedness<WH6172> of a woman<WH802> and her daughter<WH1323>, neither shalt thou take<WH3947> her son's<WH1121> daughter<WH1323>, or her daughter's<WH1323> daughter<WH1323>, to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>; for they are her near kinswomen<WH7608>: it is wickedness<WH2154>.

Neither shalt thou take<WH3947> a wife<WH802> to her sister<WH269>, to vex<WH6887> her, to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>, beside the other in her life<WH2416> time. a wife: or, one wife to another
Also thou shalt not approach<WH7126> unto a woman<WH802> to uncover<WH1540> her nakedness<WH6172>, as long as she is put apart<WH5079> for her uncleanness<WH2932>.
Moreover thou shalt not<WH5414> lie<WH7903> carnally<WH2233> with thy neighbour's<WH5997> wife<WH802>, to defile<WH2930> thyself with her.

And thou shalt not<WH5414> let any of thy seed<WH2233> pass<WH5674> through the fire to Molech<WH4432>, neither shalt thou profane<WH2490> the name<WH8034> of thy God<WH430>: I am the LORD<WH3068>. Molech: Gr. Moloch
Thou shalt not lie<WH7901> with mankind<WH2145>, as with<WH4904> womankind<WH802>: it is abomination<WH8441>.

Neither shalt thou<WH5414> lie<WH7903> with any beast<WH929> to defile<WH2930> thyself therewith: neither shall any woman<WH802> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> a beast<WH929> to lie down<WH7250> thereto: it is confusion<WH8397>.
Defile<WH2930> not ye yourselves in any of these things<WH428>: for in all these the nations<WH1471> are defiled<WH2930> which I cast out<WH7971> before<WH6440> you:
And the land<WH776> is defiled<WH2930>: therefore I do visit<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> thereof upon it, and the land<WH776> itself vomiteth out<WH6958> her inhabitants<WH3427>.

Ye shall therefore keep<WH8104> my statutes<WH2708> and my judgments<WH4941>, and shall not commit<WH6213> any of these abominations<WH8441>; neither any of your own nation<WH249>, nor any stranger<WH1616> that sojourneth<WH1481> among<WH8432> you:
(For all these<WH411> abominations<WH8441> have the men<WH582> of the land<WH776> done<WH6213>, which were before<WH6440> you, and the land<WH776> is defiled<WH2930>;)
That the land<WH776> spue not you out<WH6958> also, when ye defile<WH2930> it, as it spued out<WH6958> the nations<WH1471> that were before<WH6440> you.
For whosoever shall commit<WH6213> any of these abominations<WH8441>, even the souls<WH5315> that commit<WH6213> them shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> their people<WH5971>.

Therefore shall ye keep<WH8104> mine ordinance<WH4931>, that ye commit<WH6213> not any one of these abominable<WH8441> customs<WH2708>, which were committed<WH6213> before<WH6440> you, and that ye defile<WH2930> not yourselves therein: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
